summary: ON 5/9/2003 THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR SERVICE.  ABOUT 45 MINUTES LATER THE VEHICLE STOPPED WHILE IN A BUSY INTERSECTION.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHICH STATED THE PROBLEM WAS THE WATER PUMP AND TIMING BELT WHICH WAS ON RECALL.  THE CONSUMER WAS NEVER NOTIFIED OF THE RECALL #02V226000.    *NLM
